text: @lizzkatherine_ No one is commenting that it’s still a frightening number of cult members, mixed in a soup of #Coronavirus. If I didn’t care about the healthcare workers that will inevitably have to deal with many of these #MAGAts, I’d laugh and call it a #Coronapalooza. Hope they die at home!
